MS MCQs

    Principles of cloud computing and deployment - Test your knowledge

    »

    1. What are the four foundational principles of the trusted cloud?

      Simplicity, principal, customization, and transparency

      Design, reliability, number of datacenters, and variability

      Security, privacy, compliance, and transparency


    2. How are updates to the customer service application applied?

      Through the customer service application solution area within settings

      Through the Dynamics 365 admin center

      Through the customer service hub


    3. Which of the following app deployments would use Lifecycle Services?

      Dynamics 365 Sales

      Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

      Dynamics 365 Business Central
